website_summaries.verdict: This chrome-covered brass tap is more durable and less leaky than its plastic competitors.
pros: Made of chrome-covered brass instead of plastic
cons: Consider straining the watermelon juice if you wish to use it

customer_reviews.title: Get two, one is not enough when having a party of 10 or more people!
customer_reviews.text: I went to a neighborhood party and they had the Blazin Watermelon Tap... Everyone loved it! The only problem is you need to order two, so you have a watermelon on standby. I just ordered 3 more and will bring as the perfect party gift. Bring a watermelon filled with vodka with the Blazin Watermelon Tap and tell them to keep the tap as a gift. TOTALLY COOL. And FYI, the crappy plastic ones dont work and they leak precious vodka all over. Cheers, you will thank me :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4th of july must have
customer_reviews.text: Another great product to enhance your alcoholic adventures. Get yourself a nice smooth vodka and youll be off to the races
customer_reviews.author: mike delehanty

customer_reviews.title: Short Shank
customer_reviews.text: Shank is too short - I get that they want to give "maximum extraction", but I spent an extra 10mins thinning out the rind of a large pumpkin enough to fit both the stabilizer and nut on the inside. Once I did, the 'wall' was too thin and after 10 pulls the tap started to break thru the hole! Good thing I used a 'test pumpkin' with water first. I got a second pumpkin, went to hardware store and bought a larger (but thinner) washer to better stabilize -- we'll see how it goes! I'm sure they won't re-cast the shank, but it's just too short...maybe it will work better in the summer with watermelons!
customer_reviews.author: Drew Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Leaked badly during my party
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews and took many precautions to prevent leakage. I made a proper hole in the middle of the pumpkin, used washers on inside and outside, and tested it ahead of time. Despite this, a major leak started after only a few people used the tap. My pumpkin punch drained onto the floor during my party and got all over the rug. I had too much punch in the pumpkin (and in my brain) and couldn’t transfer it to any other bowl...so it kept leaking and distracted my guests as they continuously tried to fix it. This was a nice idea but I wouldn’t use this particular product again.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader in N. NJ

customer_reviews.title: Love This Watermelon Tap
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo happy with my new watermelon tap. I'm not a fan of plastic drinking items so I went with this metal one. Glad I did, it's sturdy the pieces fit together nice and tight and the handle is easy pull. Instructions were included and easy to follow. Had my first keg done in about twenty minutes. Can't wait to use it this weekend for our first bbq, everyone is going to think is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Marlee Senderowitz

customer_reviews.title: Worked shockingly well
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a pumpkin for Halloween and this worked great! No leaks or issues, but really was the hit of the party! I can't wait to use it for watermelons in the summer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... impressed with the quality of this tap and how sturdy it was for its low price
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the quality of this tap and how sturdy it was for its low price! It came with pretty clear instructions on how to tap a watermelon and the whole process was relatively easy (and messy!). Overall, it was a big hit at our cookout and clean-up was a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Looks terrific
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a different type of gift for someone who was going to start a outside bar and I found it !!!!! I cannot rate the product itself since it has not been used yet. Great idea and hope it is as good as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Leoutsacos

customer_reviews.title: Pumpkin Punch SUCCESS!
customer_reviews.text: I had low expectations but this worked out awesome for our Halloween pumpkin tapping. I made an awesome “Pumpkin Punch” and it was a huge hit. You do have to figure out how to grip it right, and the flow isn’t perfect, but considering this was $27 I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: Rylee T.

customer_reviews.title: Trickle
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy, despite unclear instructions. The tap works well with thin liquids; I tested with water and no problems. The tap did not work well at all with watermelon drink I made. I partially froze my watermelon(it was slushy consistency prior to being blended) and blended with juices and alcohol prior to transferring to the watermelon; I did not strain it. The mixture trickled out of the spout. Had to transfer the drink to pitchers. Next time I'll strain the watermelon, if that doesn't work I'll look for tap that has a bigger hole for liquids to flow through.
customer_reviews.author: Mairym Arthur-Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great decor for summer parties
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for a picnic party with friends. We filled our watermelon with vodka! It was a nice touch and very aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: behr

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: The threaded part needs to longer. I had to shave at least 1/2" from the inside of the pumkin to be able to thread on the nut. Otherwise it works great and everybody loved my pumpkin sangria.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: I'd love to give this product a higher review
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived quickly, in tact, and seems pretty sturdy. I am impressed with the quality of the pieces. Sellers were very accommodating and communicative when I had questions regarding the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flows out extremely slow
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about having this for my daughters 22nd birthday party. I was disappointed that I couldn't put it out. The beverage came out in drops and very slowly and I was too embarrassed to set it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great Party Item Ordered this for a party and everyone thought it was the coolest thing ever. Totally a breeze to set up. Fresh fruit makes drinks absolutely delicious, a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Laudien

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase! Used it for my Halloween party. I put charcoal activated kombucha in a carved pumpkin and it was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Savanna

customer_reviews.title: We cater parties and will use this a lot 😊
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfect we used it at a party looked great on the counter and was fun to set up Thanks
customer_reviews.author: RANDY COLLINS

customer_reviews.title: Really sturdy tap handle but pours real slow and handle is tough
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for personal use in the backyard. Instructions are simple and clear however the pour is rather slow and if you aren't careful to ensure the fit is taught it is difficult to use. My tap handle is also very tight and somewhat hard to pull on without the tap falling out of the melon. Overall I rate it as a 4 - don't plan on using it very often.
customer_reviews.author: Karma

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea, needs a screen if you have any fruit pulp in the melon. Use elongated melon for best
customer_reviews.text: Used it on a water melon that was hollowed out. Strained out the pulp and mixed juice with wine in the melon for our "keggermelon". Took a little effort to mount the tap and had to thin the melon walls. Still had trouble keeping the tap flowing as debris stopped it up. It needs a longer threaded shank and a stand off type of screen/filter to keep the flow going if there is any debris in the melon. I would have had better luck with a larger melon and mounting the tap higher than the smaller round melon we had to use.
customer_reviews.author: Charley Hogwood - Author of The Survival Group Handbook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pumpkin Keg
customer_reviews.text: High quality, sturdy tap. Easy to assemble and clean when done. We used it for a pumpkin keg at a Halloween Party. Our guests were amazed! The tap did not leak, and the handle is not flimsy while your beverage is dispensing. We will definitely use this tap again on a watermelon in the summertime.
customer_reviews.author: NurseBent

customer_reviews.title: Summer fun
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, but have to be careful it doesn’t clog.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Heath

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product.... however, I wish there were instructions either in the box, or printed on them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna H.

customer_reviews.title: Great party gift
customer_reviews.text: Hit of the party. We have it as a gift to a summer party that we went to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid and mostly works.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed nice and solid but it didnt't work well with a thicker consistency. We had to blend it more to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Diane W

customer_reviews.title: Super fun concept
customer_reviews.text: Super fun concept! And it looks great. I followed all the reviewers' advice, however, to strain the pulp and make a very thin cocktail but it still came out so slowly that it almost wasn't worth it. We ended up pouring the cocktail from the watermelon like a pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Made from heavy duty steel. This tap will last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watermelon tap to use at barbecues and parties. It is very heavy duty steel. It is not made from cheap plastic or anything that will break. This tap will last for years to come! You have to cut the top off the watermelon and hollow if out. Insert the tap securely using the washers that come with it do that it does not drop or leak and then mix your favorite adult beverage of punch in the watermelon. Place the top back on and you have the coolest drink ever! I like to put some of the watermelon back in to add some extra flavor too. I received this in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.
customer_reviews.author: MelanieH

product_meta.title: Blazin Watermelon Tap - Brass and Chrome Keg Kit - Pumpkin Fruit Ice Tea Drink Dispenser
product_meta.description:
Premium chrome covered brass. Don't be fooled by our competitors' cheap flimsy plastic taps that leak and break easily. Heavy brass tap offers the quality, reliability, easy pour and confidence you need to make your party a hit.

Transform regular melons into unique kegs of fun. Be the hit of the party. Create naturally infused alcoholic or non alcoholic cocktails. Impress friends with your creativity at your next picnic or barbecue. Cider, juice, punch, beer, wine or sangria. Become the libation mixologist everyone tells stories about.

Avoid the fiasco of cheap flimsy plastic competitors that can break in the middle of your important event. 

Easy installation. Includes step by step diagram that makes tapping your first melon a breeze. Create a level base on bottom of fruit by cutting flat. Cut the top off the melon and hollow it out. Make a hole slightly smaller than the shank in the bottom of the melon. Insert the shank and tighten the nut. Now fill with whatever beverage you can imagine. You'll be pouring tasty cocktails in no time. 

Includes chrome covered steel faucet, handle, 1" shank with nut. Smaller shank allows for maximum beverage extraction percentage. Great for water, soda, vodka, gin, moonshine, martinis, lemonde, iced coffee, Arnold Palmers, spice chai or ginger ale. Use for adult drinking games, shots, mixers, gift baskets.

Comes in original Blazin' Tap packaging by Yuroga.

100% LIFETIME GUARANTEE! Our competitors offer limited guarantees. If you are dissatisfied with our product you get your money back. NO RISK. Order Now.
feature_bullets: Premium chrome covered brass. Don't be fooled by competitors' cheap flimsy plastic taps that leak and break. Heavy brass tap offers the quality, reliability, easy pour and confidence you need to make your party a hit.
Transform regular melons into unique kegs of fun. You'll be the hit of the party.
Cider, juice, punch, beer, wine or sangria. Become the libation mixologist everyone tells stories about.
Create naturally infused cocktails. Impress friends with your creativity at your next picnic or barbecue. Worry free, step by step diagram guides you through the easy installation process.

100% LIFETIME GUARANTEE! Buy from Yuroga. Blazin' Tap includes Blazin' Bison packaging, instructions and customer support. Our competitors offer limited guarantees. If you are dissatisfied with our product you get your money back. NO RISK. Order Now.
